description: Quiet. Emptied. Still. That's what's gonna be your companion for the rest of your adventure.
Water striking down the rocks looks beautiful, yet you cannot waste much time.
Water drops falling from the cave's ceiling unnerve you.
Great dunes you've heard about are actually true. Scary.
Even the bravest men must sometimes climb the highest mountains.
The horizon is not the only thing a human seeks.
Wherever you look, it's only sand and your own demise.
Trying to walk on the ice, you make an impression of a penguin.
A myth-like forest spreads in front of your eyes.
A mist grasping your feet makes you feel abandoned.
The hell-like screams and ambience is almost impossible to withstand.
The smell of farm makes you calm. As you approach it the only thing you can think of is that variety never hurt anyone.
Shouts and screams of those surrounding you are unsettling.
Water drops falling from the cave's ceiling unnerve you.
Water drops falling from the cave's ceiling unnerve you.
Bones, bones everywhere.
You enter a dim-lightened construction and seem to notice moving shadows. Maybe it's just your imagination.
Bones, bones everywhere.
The time you spent in the catacombs is driving you crazy. You feel like you need to get out as soon as possible.
Upon entering the bright light in the center of the tower looks like a message from above: 'Come and reach me'.
Dragons' roars send a chill down your spine. You carefully step into the tower.
You've heard about the labyrinth before, although those news were not happy-ending stories.
